summary: A group of young shoppers and employees must band together when a zombie outbreak over runs their Hong Kong shopping center in the middle of the shopping day.
cast: Jordan Chan|Emotion Cheung|Sam Lee|Yiu-Cheung Lai|Angela Ying-Ying Tong|Suk Yin Lai|Tat-Wah Lok|Frankie Chan|Tak Chi Tam|Chi Chuen Chan|Soi Cheang|Francis Cherry|Siu-Lung Ching|Matt Chow|Chun-Sum Lee|Chi On Leung|Wai-Man Mok|Ka-Wai Ng|Wai-Ga Poon|Yiu-Wah Siu|Suk-Mui Tam|Ga-Fung Wong|Reiko Takagi
title: Sang faa sau see
